name: data_fetch_workflow
description: Workflow to fetch data from an external source and process it.

transitions.name: fetch_data
transitions.description: Fetch data from the external source
transitions.end_state_description: Data has been successfully fetched from the external source

externalized_processors.name: process_fetch_data
externalized_processors.description: Process to fetch data from the API

transitions.name: process_fetched_data
transitions.start_state_description: Data has been successfully fetched from the external source
transitions.end_state_description: The fetched data has been processed

externalized_processors.name: process_process_fetched_data
externalized_processors.description: Process to handle and manipulate the fetched data
